definition: to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.english: In fact, the world of friendship there are jealous, that nothing less than love.
sentences.chinese: 其实，友情世界里也存在着吃醋，那滋味不亚于爱情。

sentences.english: He is second to none in physics.
sentences.chinese: 他在物理学方面绝不亚于任何人。

sentences.english: Though it was winter , the charm was not less excellent as that in spring, summer and autumn.
sentences.chinese: 虽是冬季，景色的美妙绝伦不亚于春季，夏季和秋季。

sentences.english: Berlioz compared him favorably to Beethoven and Gluck.
sentences.chinese: 柏辽兹认为他并不亚于贝多芬和格鲁克。

sentences.english: Though he is over50, he is as adaptable as the young.
sentences.chinese: 尽管已经50多岁了，他的适应能力并不亚于年轻人。

sentences.english: Its danger allows the degree not to be inferior to hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 其危容程度不亚于高血压。

sentences.english: My father, no less than I, is a base-ball fan.
sentences.chinese: 我的父亲不亚于我也是个棒球迷。

sentences.english: Investors care about people as well as numbers.
sentences.chinese: 投资者对于人的关注不亚于数字。

sentences.english: A sub-clerk in the post office is the equal of a conqueror if consciousness is common to them.
sentences.chinese: 如果意识思维相同，邮局的下等职员不亚于一个皇帝。

sentences.english: And as much as I want her, I can't let it run my whole life.
sentences.chinese: 并不亚于我想她，我不能让它运行我的整个生命。

sentences.english: His pare notnts are not no less glad over his engagement dawn he is (glad over his engagement).
sentences.chinese: 他的双亲对他订婚的高兴并不亚于他自己。

sentences.english: This old car of mine compares favourably with Blake's new one.
sentences.chinese: 我的这辆旧车并不亚于布莱克的新车。

sentences.english: Help to make earth happy, like the heaven above.
sentences.chinese: 小小的善举，细微的爱语，使地球快乐，不亚于天堂。

sentences.english: Rivaling the impact of the personal computer was another epochal breakthrough.
sentences.chinese: 另一项划时代技术突破的影响力不亚于个人计算机。

definition: not to be inferior in any aspects (idiom)/to surpass/to outdo/(derog.) to be even worse
pinyin: you3 guo4 zhi1 er2 wu2 bu4 ji2

definition: it is obvious that.../as one can well imagine...
as many as/no less than/not inferior to/as good as/on a par with
it goes without saying/it is self-evident
lit. mustn't speak of two things on the same day (idiom); not to be mentioned in the same breath/incomparable
pinyin: bu4 ke3 tong2 ri4 er2 yu3

definition: unprecedented and never to be duplicated/the first and the last/unmatched/unique
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
